name: Bolito
description:
audio warning.

execute queue on right trigger instead of a button as ui implies.

Controls for Keyboard:  WASD to queue move, E to queue curl up, Space to play out the queue and Arrow Keys for the camera.

The armadillo Bolito want's to get back to their friends after getting lost on a pee break.

Living so close to the ground makes it difficult for Bolito to see where they're going.

Help Bolito find their friends by telling them where to go.

Hopefully your instructions will help Bolito find their way back!

Each of your inputs gets added to a queue that you can then have play out. Curling up makes you curl up and roll down slopes.

Game made as part of GMTKJam and the IFGameSH Summer Jam.

If you enjoyed the game but encountered audio or loading issues, check out this temporal link that will be removed once this page can be updated with the fixed version.
